subject: Boats and Boating
Luxury Goods
lead_paragraph: Transporting yachts on freighters instead of sailing them is a growing worldwide business. This year, four companies that dominate the trade will carry some 4,000 yachts.
snippet: Transporting yachts on freighters instead of sailing them is a growing worldwide business. This year, four companies that dominate the trade will carry some 4,000 yachts.
